projects.title: E-commerce
projects.description: The React Ecommerce Web Application is a modern online shopping platform designed to provide users with a seamless and intuitive shopping experience. Built using React.js, this application offers a user-friendly interface coupled with robust functionality to ensure a smooth browsing and purchasing journey for customers.

projects.title: E-commerce
projects.description: The Electronics Ecommerce Web Application is a comprehensive online platform tailored specifically for electronic products, offering a wide range of devices and accessories to tech enthusiasts and consumers alike. Developed using JavaScript and Bootstrap, this application combines powerful functionality with sleek design to deliver an engaging shopping experience for users passionate about electronics :)

projects.title: To-Do-List *CRUD*
projects.description: The Simple ToDoList Web Application is a straightforward yet powerful tool designed to help users manage their tasks efficiently. This application implements basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations to enable users to seamlessly add, view, modify, and remove tasks from their to-do lists.!
